analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/9/0xebc71036a37451e87cc43af8ae7ac123aa750dcb.sol#91) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/9/0xebc71036a37451e87cc43af8ae7ac123aa750dcb.sol#117-124)

Ceyron.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/9/0xebc71036a37451e87cc43af8ae7ac123aa750dcb.sol#211) shadows:
	- CeyronToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/9/0xebc71036a37451e87cc43af8ae7ac123aa750dcb.sol#20-22)

Ceyron.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0xebc71036a37451e87cc43af8ae7ac123aa750dcb.sol#211)
